title: Mobile app | Creatio Academy
content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.1 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.1 Setup Freedom UI Classic UI Calendar Dashboards Portal FAQ
markdown:
This is documentation for Creatio **8.1**.

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/creatio-apps/overview/platform-overview)** (8.3).
